name: Rodriguez, Houston
seen:
First Seen: 2031, Operation Unknown Entity (Team 11 Lead).
Last Seen: 2047, Exfiltrating Entity Corp HQ via private VTOL.
gear:
Tactical Preference: Sterile kits. He avoids the "3-line" branding used by his subordinates, preferring bespoke, unbranded high-tier ballistic protection.

The "Will" Inscription: Intelligence suggests Rodriguez carries a |customized .45 ACP sidearm| with internal engravings dedicated to ||his brother.||
bio:
*Summary:*
Rodriguez is the primary architect of the current global security landscape. Following a decorated tenure in the USMC and Navy SEALs, his trajectory shifted violently after the Ukraine Incident. ||The confirmed arrival of his brother, Will, in Ukraine|| for treatment and his subsequent "disappearance" served as the catalyst for Rodriguez’s disillusionment with NATO’s bureaucratic limitations.

*Psychological Profile:*
Exhibits |"Clinical Detachment."| He is noted for his "surgical" approach to high-intensity conflict, a trait first recognized by Major Marcus Novak. Rodriguez no longer views conflict as a matter of ideology, but as a series of logistics and leverage. He is the ghost in the machine of the ENTICORE development, using his grief for his brother to fuel a global hunt for the "Architects" of the medical disappearance.
